page.title: 10JACK KEMP
page.content: MR KEMP {********* Mr Kemp's family have lived in East Bridgford for{150}years. He is{82} years old and has lived in East Bridgford all his life. He likes living in East Bridgford because of the fresh air,the country surrounding the village, and the good bus service. The roads have improved since he was a child and there are more houses.He dislikes the flats but many of the old houses are the same.He went to school in the old building and there were only{4}teachers.He used to swim in the River Trent.He once got the cane for playing truant and following the hounds.The village policeman would wrap his cape around naughty children. Mr Kemp worked in the pea factory in the second world war.Since then he has worked as a gardener.
